title: GHG activities
publisher: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
description: National Atmospheric Emissions Inventory (NAEI) - Greenhouse gases, Between 1990 - 2017, Total GHGs in CO2 Eq
datasetNotes: On landing page, downloadable CSV file located near top pf page under heading "UK emissions data selector ".
sizingNotes: Structured table in CSV format, should be straightforward to transform into tidy data.
notes: The NAEI estimates annual pollutant emissions from 1970 to the most current publication year for the majority of pollutants. The NAEI website is produced and maintained by Ricardo Energy & Environment
